page.title: 03LIFE STYLE
page.content: A DAY IN ANDREW'S LIFE. I GET UP AT 7.25 A.M., GET DRESSED AND THEN MAKE UP SHEEP FEED OF BRUISED BARLEY, BRAN, COARSE MIX, SEAWEED MEAL AND SOAKED BEET PULP. I FEED SIX SHEEP AND SIX LAMBS. I GIVE THEM TWO BUCKETS OF WATER, ONE SECTION OF HAY AND ONE SECTION OF PEA STRAW AND HALF A BAG OF SILAGE. I FEED TWO LAMBS BY BOTTLE. AFTER BEAKFAST I CHANGE INTO MY GOOD CLOTHES BEFORE DRIVING UP TO SCHOOL, WHICH IS FROM 8.45 A.M. TO 3 P.M., WITH 15 MINUTES PLAYTIME AND AN HOUR FOR LUNCH. I WALK HOME THROUGH THE FIELDS. I CHANGE INTO MY PLAYING CLOTHES, FEED THE SHEEP AGAIN, AND WATCH T.V. BEFORE I HAVE TEA, AND FEED THE LAMBS AGAIN. THEN I HAVE SUPPER AND GO TO BED.
